title: Statement by Vice President Biden on Senator Arlen Specter | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




April 28, 2009

 



Statement by Vice President Biden on Senator Arlen Specter




 THE WHITE HOUSE Office of the Vice President   For Immediate Release  April 28, 2009  Statement by Vice President Biden on Senator Arlen Specter  "I welcome my old friend to the Democratic Party. Senator Arlen Specter is a man of remarkable courage and integrity. I know he will remain a powerful and independent voice for Pennsylvania and the country."
